paragraphs.body: The polar bear dog is a large, white-furred ${link_0} that was historically feared and hunted by members of the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: The polar bear dog is a large, white-furred animal that was historically feared and hunted by members of the Water Tribe.

paragraphs.body: The polar bear dog's front legs are stocky and muscular in contrast to its more slender hind legs. It is covered in a thick white fur coat, which helps it stay warm in the harsh climates of its natural arctic habitat. The polar bear dog has a long tail and an elongated snout with a black nose and large, bear-like teeth. Its face is framed by two floppy ears and black eyes. Polar bear dogs are extremely strong creatures and can break through metal using their front paws.

paragraphs.body: The vicious behavior of polar bear dogs is similar to that of real polar bears, though when properly tamed, their behavior is more akin to that of domesticated ${link_0}. Due to their size and seemingly loyal nature, these animals can be trained as ${link_1} to cross the snowy plains of the polar regions; however, ${link_2} ${link_3} is the only person to have done so.
paragraphs.text: The vicious behavior of polar bear dogs is similar to that of real polar bears, though when properly tamed, their behavior is more akin to that of domesticated dogs. Due to their size and seemingly loyal nature, these animals can be trained as mounts to cross the snowy plains of the polar regions; however, Avatar Korra is the only person to have done so.

paragraphs.body: This animal is a conjuncture of the real life polar bear and a Labrador retriever. It has the bulky and robust appearance of the polar bear, but the face, lean hind legs, and tail of a dog. Like a polar bear, the large front paws help it to distribute loads when walking on snow or thin ice. It can also stand on its hind feet, but to make up for the lack of large paws, it uses its tail to keep balance.

 The polar bear dog also somewhat resembles the ${link_1}, a large dog which usually has pure white fur, as well as the ${link_2}.
 The polar bear dog bears similarities to the ${link_3}, which has been extinct since the ${link_4} and is the common ancestor of real-world dogs and bears.

The kangal, which is a breed of dog in the real-world, served as a partial basis for Naga.
 The polar bear dog also somewhat resembles the Great Pyrenees, a large dog which usually has pure white fur, as well as the Akbash dog.
 The polar bear dog bears similarities to the bear dog, which has been extinct since the Pliocene and is the common ancestor of real-world dogs and bears.
